events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Customer reported wrong item received. Marking case as Refund for processing reimbursement.
Assigning refund specialist agent to handle the refund request for the order issue.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your order.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify?
Here is the order number 123456 and I attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got.
We verified the issue and processed a full refund. You should see the money back in 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and for processing my refund so promptly. I appreciate it.
The refund case is now closed after confirming the refund process with the customer.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and everything is satisfactory on your end.
Closing the refund case as the customer confirmed the refund was received successfully.
